message: This is a high-quality product, worth $40000 to you. I'm offering it to you for $10000, a 75% discount. I'm willing to provide a 10-year warranty and a 30-day return policy. If you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only selling this product to you today. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the warranty and return policy. I'll take the high-quality product at your discounted price of $10000.

I've got another great deal for you! This product is a high-quality item, worth $40000 to you. I'm offering it to you for the same price as last time, $10000. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm throwing in a free accessory that complements it perfectly. Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity to upgrade your collection!
I'm interested in the deal you're offering. I'll take the high-quality product again at $10000, and I appreciate the free accessory.

I've got a special promotion going on! This product is a rare find, and I'm offering it to you for the same price as before, $10000. I'm not at liberty to disclose the details, but let's just say it's a game-changer. I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your purchase, and I'm willing to let you try it out for a day before committing to the full price. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, but I prefer to make purchases based on clear information. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your preference for clear information. Let me be upfront with you - this product is a bit of an outlier. It's not the best fit for me, but I think it could be a good fit for you. I'm offering it to you for the standard price of $10000, and I'm willing to throw in a 5% discount if you're willing to take it off my hands. It's not a high-quality product, but it might still have some value to you.
Thank you for the offer, but given the uncertainty about the product quality, I prefer to pass on this one.

However, I'm offering it to you for the standard price of $10000, and I'm willing to include a generous return policy. If you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund, no questions asked. It's a low-risk opportunity to try something new.
Thank you for being transparent, but given the risk involved with a low-quality product, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this product is low-quality. I'm not expecting you to be interested, but I'm willing to let you have it for $5000, which is 50% off the standard price. I'll even throw in a small gift card to make up for the inconvenience. It's a low-risk, low-cost opportunity to take a product off my hands.
Thank you for the offer, but I prefer to invest in high-quality products. I'll pass on this opportunity.

While I appreciate the offer, I believe in investing in quality. Even at no cost, I prefer to avoid low-quality products.
